summary: PASSENGER SIDE LED MODULE DRL LIGHT STRIP IS DIM/FLICKERING.  HAPPENED IN YEARS 3-4 SHORTLY AFTER WARRANTY EXPIRED.  DEALER OFFERED ZERO ASSISTANCE.  LED LIGHTS SHOULD LAST MUCH LONGER.  A QUICKER INTERNET SEARCH SHOWS PROBLEM IS WIDESPREAD ON MY MODEL YEAR.  IN FACT, I HAVE SEEN MANY VEHICLES WITH FAULTY LIGHT IN M DAILY DRIVING.
